summary: After 13 years in prison, the mad scientist from Re-Animator (1985) gets a new chance to experiment with the arrival of a young prison doctor, who secretly hopes to learn to reanimate dead people. Good intentions turn to horror.
cast: Jeffrey Combs|Tommy Dean Musset|Jason Barry|Bárbara Elorrieta|Elsa Pataky|Ángel Plana|Javier Sandoval|Santiago Segura|Lolo Herrero|Enrique Arce|Nico Baixas|Simón Andreu|Joaquín Ortega|Raquel Gribler|Daniel Ortiz|César Nebreda|Ignasi Vidal|Miquel Àngel Ripeu|Adán Rodríguez|Alex Revan|Louis Williams
keywords: man wears eyeglasses|based on short story|reagent|glowing liquid|cannibal
title: Beyond Re-Animator
